testcase.classname: Verify the details with JSON which are displayed on wealth register page.
testcase.name: Verify that user successfully verify the balanceSheet report with given JSON data
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged into portal with "ravi.prakash" and "user@123".........passed When user Clicks on menu - General Ledger and clicks on Balance Sheet.......passed Then Balance Sheet page is displayed........................................passed Then user Search the details by entering correct entity and date and clicked on process.passed Then All Equities and Liabilities are displayed on page....................passed Then User verify the details with given JSON................................passed
